VII.i.1.A.4.f
.
Action to Take Upon Receipt of a Request to Add a Dependent That Was Not Submitted on a Prescribed Form
If a claimant submits a request to add a dependent but fails to use one of the forms referenced in
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 1.A.1.a
, first attempt to contact the claimant by telephone for the purpose of completing
VA Form 21-686c
and/or
VA Form 21-674, Request for Approval of School Attendance
, on the claimant’s behalf.
If attempts to contact the claimant by telephone are unsuccessful, follow the instructions in
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 2.G.1.a
.
Reference
:  For more information on the authority of RO employees to complete and sign
VA Form 21-686c
and
VA Form 21-674
on a claimant’s behalf, see
M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, 1.A.4.j
.
